summary: Modern, high-end construction company marketing website with a bold premium 2026-style design, strong typography, smooth animations, and conversion-focused responsive layout.
architectural_notes: Use bold color palette (charcoal black, construction yellow, white) with large modern sans-serif typography
Use smooth scroll/reveal animations and micro-interactions; consider subtle glassmorphism/gradients, rounded corners, soft shadows
Use professional stock construction imagery placed strategically across the site
Ensure fully responsive layout with mobile-first considerations

existing_features.title: Build a single-page marketing website for a construction company with a bold, premium, professional 2026-trending layout using a clean grid system, large hero sections, full-width imagery, modern spacing, rounded corners, soft shadows, and subtle glassmorphism/gradient touches.

Implement a sticky, transparent navbar that changes style on scroll (e.g., gains solid/blurred background, stronger shadow/border) and includes navigation links that smoothly scroll to each section (Hero, About, Services, Projects, Why Choose Us, Testimonials, Contact/CTA).

Create the Hero section with a full-width cinematic construction-site background image, a strong headline exactly “Building the Future with Strength & Precision”, a short subtitle, two prominent CTA buttons labeled “Get a Quote” and “View Projects”, and subtle parallax and/or fade-in animation.
Implement the About Us section as a split layout (image on one side, text on the other) with a modern overlapping image effect and smooth reveal-on-scroll animation.

Implement the Services section with 3–6 service cards in a responsive grid. Each card must include an icon, title, and short description, and have hover micro-interactions (lift + shadow) consistent with the premium style.

Implement Featured Projects as a masonry or modern grid gallery with full-bleed project images. On hover, show an overlay with project details, and on click open a lightbox (modal) to view the image larger and navigate between projects.
Implement a Why Choose Us section with a clean icon-based layout and animated statistic counters (animated numbers) that begin counting when the section enters the viewport.
Implement Testimonials as a modern card carousel/slider with smooth transitions and responsive behavior (touch/swipe support on mobile).
Implement a conversion-focused Call to Action section with a dark background, bold typography, and a strong CTA button (English label) that visually stands out using the construction-yellow accent.
Create a minimal but modern Footer including contact information, quick links, and social icons, styled to match the premium theme.

Add site-wide smooth reveal animations on scroll for major sections/elements and micro-interactions on hover (buttons, links, cards) while maintaining performance and accessibility (respect reduced motion preference).

Ensure the entire site is fully responsive and mobile-optimized, with strong typography (large modern sans-serif), clear hierarchy, and modern UI/UX best practices (readability, contrast, spacing, accessible interactions).

Add the required generated construction imagery as static assets under frontend/public/assets/generated and wire them into the Hero, About, and Projects sections as full-width/strategic visuals consistent with the premium layout.
